name: A Heroine Story
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes.

Victoria continues her family's legacy as the Mayor of a small village in the snowy valley. Determined to provide for those who depend on her, she will stop at nothing to guarantee their safety and well being. Her duty is her life, and she would sacrifice herself in order to fulfill it.

When a wizard comes to the village to help Victoria against a magical entity, things take a turn for the unexpected and the young mayor will have to make a decision that will change her life forever.

FEATURES


* Classical Storyline
* A well developed cast of characters
* Many different places to explores, caves, forests, mountains and more
* Optional dungeons to explore
* A Quest Journal to help you keep track of your objectives
* Mouse Support
